classes.name: zui-cursor-all-scroll
classes.description: Cursor showing that something can be scrolled in any direction (panned).

classes.name: zui-cursor-alias
classes.description: Indicating an alias or shortcut is to be created.

classes.name: zui-cursor-auto
classes.description: The browser determines the cursor to display based on the current context.

classes.name: zui-cursor-cell
classes.description: Indicating that cells can be selected.

classes.name: zui-cursor-col-resize
classes.description: The item/column can be resized horizontally. Often rendered as arrows pointing left and right with a vertical bar separating.

classes.name: zui-cursor-context-menu
classes.description: A context menu is available under the cursor.

classes.name: zui-cursor-copy
classes.description: Indicating that something can be copied.

classes.name: zui-cursor-crosshair
classes.description: Cross cursor, often used to indicate selection in a bitmap.

classes.name: zui-cursor-default
classes.description: Default cursor, typically an arrow.

classes.name: zui-cursor-e-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-ew-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-grab
classes.description: Indicates that something can be grabbed (dragged to be moved).

classes.name: zui-cursor-grabbing
classes.description: Indicates that something can be grabbed (dragged to be moved).

classes.name: zui-cursor-help
classes.description: Indicating help is available.

classes.name: zui-cursor-move
classes.description: The hovered object may be moved.

classes.name: zui-cursor-n-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-ne-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-nesw-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-no-drop
classes.description: Cursor showing that a drop is not allowed at the current location.

classes.name: zui-cursor-none
classes.description: No cursor is rendered.

classes.name: zui-cursor-not-allowed
classes.description: Cursor showing that something cannot be done.

classes.name: zui-cursor-ns-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-nw-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-nwse-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-pointer
classes.description: E.g. used when hovering over links, typically a hand.

classes.name: zui-cursor-progress
classes.description: The program is busy in the background but the user can still interact with the interface (unlike for wait).

classes.name: zui-cursor-row-resize
classes.description: The item/row can be resized vertically. Often rendered as arrows pointing up and down with a horizontal bar separating them.

classes.name: zui-cursor-s-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-se-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-sw-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-text
classes.description: Indicating text can be selected, typically an I-beam.

classes.name: zui-cursor-vertical-text
classes.description: Indicating that vertical text can be selected, typically a sideways I-beam.

classes.name: zui-cursor-w-resize
classes.description: Some edge is to be moved. For example, the se-resize cursor is used when the movement starts from the south-east corner of the box.

classes.name: zui-cursor-wait
classes.description: The program is busy (sometimes an hourglass or a watch).

classes.name: zui-cursor-zoom-in
classes.description: Indicates that something can be zoomed (magnified) in.

classes.name: zui-cursor-zoom-out
classes.description: Indicates that something can be zoomed (magnified) out.
